name: bug-gem
effect: Held : When the holder uses a damaging bug-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.
short_effect: Held: When the holder uses a damaging bug-type move, the move has 1.5× power and this item is consumed.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A gem with an insect-like essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Bug-type move one time.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A gem with an insect-like essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Bug-type move one time.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A gem with an insect-like essence. When held, it strengthens the power of a Bug-type move one time.
